This quiet community was first settled in 1868 and is divided into three coves - Upper, Middle and Lower. It boasts a craft store and tea room where one might purchase some unique souvenirs. There is also a nice picnic area and beach where, if the tide is low, you can dig for clams (known locally as "cocks and hens"). Happy Adventure also has great vantage points for whale watching or just admire the surrounding scenery.
